title: Before I Go: A Novel
description: Madison has been ice skating as long as she's been walking. Jack has been her best friend since she was six years old and now at sixteen, Madison is completely oblivious to his deep feelings for her. When tragedy strikes unexpectedly and she is told she doesn't have much time left, Madison is forced to look at her life differently. Only after she opens her heart entirely does she understand the magnitude of the sacrifices her family made, realize the depths of Jack's love and know in her heart that she was blessed in every way. "Before I Go" has been called a brilliant novel, breaking your heart in a beautiful way and an amazing story of life, love and loss.
author: Riley Weston
